summary: Two strangers come to discover the fate of their respective children in the 2005 terrorist attacks on London.
cast: Brenda Blethyn|Sotigui Kouyaté|Sami Bouajila|Roschdy Zem|Francis Magee|Bernard Blancan|Marc Baylis|Gareth Randall|Aurélie Eltvedt|Mathieu Schiffman|Diveen Henry|Salah Mohamed-Marich|Gurdepak Chaggar|Faycal Sekkoum|Sherekia Barton|Elisabeth Clark|Vidya Fellon Sreenivasan
keywords: missing son|guernsey|muslim|london bus|loss of loved one
title: London river
